Eligibility criteria
Only randomized clinical trials comparing the use of prophylactic amiodarone, with or without concomitant beta-blockers, against beta-blockers in adult patients aged â‰¥18 years for the prevention of POAF after cardiac surgery were included in this meta-analysis. Only comparative randomized clinical trials that measured clinical outcomes were included in this review. Clinical trials of drug pharmacodynamics and pharmacokinetics were excluded.
